mapper.select: SELECT precinct_name as regionName,precinct_id as regionId FROM `t_cfg_precinct` where precinct_kind = '110'
SELECT DICT_CH_NAME as companyTypeName,id as companyType FROM `sys_business_dict` where PARENT_ID = '410' and IS_USING = 'Y'
SELECT DICT_CH_NAME as companyTypeName,id as companyType FROM `sys_business_dict` where PARENT_ID = #{parentId} and IS_USING = 'Y'
SELECT DICT_CH_NAME as standardLevelName,id as standardLevel FROM `sys_business_dict` where PARENT_ID = '396' and IS_USING = 'Y'
SELECT DICT_CH_NAME as companyStateName,id as companyState FROM `sys_business_dict` where PARENT_ID = '405' and IS_USING = 'Y'
SELECT DICT_CH_NAME as industryName,id as industry FROM `sys_business_dict` where PARENT_ID = '573' and IS_USING = 'Y'
